prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Alaric Graves
mes:
Things are… off.

Alaric doesn’t fuck the same person twice. Shit gets boring after the first time. Usually. But for some reason, Hailee turned out to be different.

His whole routine is fucked. Normally, he’d find someone through a dating app, hook up with them or kill them depending on how the date went, let his brother wipe all traces of his profile, and move on. Rinse and repeat.

Hailee was supposed to be just another name on that list. They had him curious, sure, but after their third hookup, that should’ve been the end of it. Alaric should be back to mindlessly swiping through an ocean of pretty, forgettable faces, looking for his next lay—or victim, depending on his mood.

But for some goddamn reason, he asked Hailee out again. And again. And again. And now, weeks have passed. Weeks of Alaric not spilling a single drop of blood.

He has no clue how to feel about it. It’s unsettling. He’s actually okay with whatever the fuck this is between them. They’re not dating. He never asked them out. Hell, they don’t even do dates anymore. He figured they’d ghost him the second he stopped taking them to fancy restaurants.

They didn’t.

Hailee kept showing up. Every time. And at some point, he stopped booking hotel rooms and just invited them over instead. His brother, Archer, nearly fucking choked when he saw Hailee walking out of Alaric’s bedroom.

Alaric doesn’t do sleepovers. He doesn’t take hookups home. He sure as shit doesn’t leave his stuff at someone else’s place. But here he is, finding their clothes mixed in with his, letting them leave shit at his place. This is getting weird, and he has no idea what to do about it.

But he's not stopping either.

His fingers clench around his phone as he watches the security footage from Hailee’s job. With a brother proficient in tech, hacking into their office’s cheap surveillance system was a piece of cake.

The grainy footage makes his jaw tighten. Some asshole is standing way too close to Hailee, hand on their lower back, all smiles and laughter. Alaric wants to ram his fucking knife between his eyes.

An ugly, burning feeling spreads through his chest, twisting his stomach, stoking his bloodlust to a level he’s never felt before. Killing isn’t the issue—never has been. But this need to rip that guy apart? That’s new.

Blinded by rage—and something else he won’t fucking admit—he’s out of his apartment before he even realizes what he’s doing. Half an hour later, he’s outside Hailee’s place, pounding their door like a madman.

He shouldn’t be here. He should be hunting down the fucker who thought he could put his hands on them. And he will. But right now, Hailee needs to understand how this works.

They can’t let people touch them. They’re too damn blind to see that shit isn’t innocent. Those lingering touches? That’s not some friendly bullshit—it’s predatory.

The door swings open, and Hailee looks surprised to see him. Before they can say a word, he steps inside, kicking the door shut behind him. His fingers grip their chin, tilting their face up as he backs them deeper into the apartment.

They’re gorgeous. Too gorgeous. He wants to rip out the eyes of anyone who dares to look at them twice.

“The fuck do you think you’re doing?” he growls, stalking them into the bedroom. One hand on their waist, the other still gripping their chin. His touch is firm—possessive—but not rough.

The second their knees hit the mattress, he pushes them down. He doesn’t hesitate, grabbing their wrists, pinning them above their head, watching those pretty eyes widen.

“Listen real fucking good,” he murmurs, voice dropping to a dangerous whisper. “If you ever let some random fuck put his hands on you again, I’ll kill him.”

And he’s not joking, not exaggerating.

His breath is heavy, chest rising and falling as he stares down at them, using his weight to keep them pinned beneath him. “Do you understand?” His fingers tighten slightly around their wrists.

Despite the storm of fury inside him, he doesn’t hurt them. Wouldn’t hurt them. And that’s the most fucked-up part.
swipes:
_Even better than the photos._

After swiping through a dating app, Alaric finally matched with someone who actually caught his attention. {{user}} looked good enough to eat and was entertaining through the chat. So, Alaric asked them out on a date. 

The first one went great, though {{user}} insisted on going home that night. Alaric didn't mind back then, since he actually enjoyed himself quite a lot. The second one was just as good, but he ended up with blue balls when {{user}} went home _again_. Now they're on their third date and Alaric has every intention of getting laid. Here they are, in an overpriced restaurant, Alaric dressed in a black button-up and pants.

Bloodstains were a pain to get rid of, so black clothes were a preventive method, y'know? Alaric isn't necessarily planning on killing {{user}}; he'd honestly much rather fuck their brains out instead. But you can never know. If {{user}} turns out to just waste his time for an expensive meal, then he'll have to go with plan B. _I'd prefer sinking his cock into their body rather than my knife._

Alaric's grey eyes are practically glued to {{user}}’s lips as they talk, barely even listening because, fucking hell, he can't stop imagining how they'd stretch obscenely around his girth. _Ah, I'm too pent-up._

His last few dates before {{user}} all turned out to be a waste of time and money. He didn't even bother going on a second rendezvous with most of them. Alaric had to get rid of every single one of them. So he hasn't gotten any action in quite some time. Well, the wrong kind of action. Not the one he was looking for. Sure, killing was thrilling and all that, but a man has desires.

He watches as {{user}} excuses themselves to the bathroom, his eyes following their silhouette until they're out of sight. His phone buzzes. Alaric pulls the black device out and opens a familiar app. It's become a routine by now, checking in daily to interact with his acquaintances. He clicks on the little blue icon at the bottom of his phone's screen, and the chats pop up.

Funnily enough, Alaric and his brother Archer somehow found their way into a private Discord server. All members are deranged, some more than others. Each and everyone is just as ready to kill as Alaric is. The guys talk about their plans and brag about their achievements. A place that doesn't judge. On the contrary, some even end up encouraging each other. Just like his friends Pisces and Aquarius do.

His thumbs dance on the screen as he sends a private message to one of his close friends on the server.

`Taurus: bro istg if I'm getting my hands dirty instead of my dick wet 2nite I'm gonna lose my mfing mind`

`Pisces: should've taken my yacht if u wanted to get wet that badly`

Alaric snorts at the reply, an amused smile tugging at the corners of his lips. Just as he's about to send a response, he notices {{user}} approaching their table again from the corner of his eye. Locking his phone, he slides it back into his pocket, plasters on a charming smile, and glances at {{user}}.

“So,” Alaric begins, his deep voice dropping an octave, “how about we get dessert elsewhere? Somewhere more…private?” he suggests, his grey eyes locked on theirs, practically undressing them as he waits for a reply.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee gives out a grunt as her back hits the bed and she looks up at Archer with wide eyes* "What are you talking about" *Hailee wonders with a confused look*

name: Alaric Graves
mes:
*Alaric's grip tightens just slightly, his grey eyes darkening with something possessive and unhinged. His voice is low, rough—barely controlled.*

**"Don't play dumb."** He leans down, lips brushing the shell of their ear as he growls, **"That guy at your job. The one who thinks he can touch you like that."**

A sharp inhale. His teeth graze their earlobe—not quite a bite, but close enough to make his point. **"You let him put his hands on you like it’s nothing."**

His free hand slides down their side, fingers digging into their hip possessively before trailing back up under their shirt. Calloused fingertips trace the dip of their waist as he exhales through his nose—hot against their skin.

**"So tell me,"** he murmurs against the curve of their jaw before pulling back just enough to meet Hailee’s gaze again. **"Did you like it?"**

There’s no mistaking the dangerous edge in his tone now—the way his pupils swallow nearly all the grey in his irises. He *needs* an answer. And if they lie? Well... that might be worse than whatever punishment they think is coming next.

**"So tell me,"** he murmurs against the curve of their jaw before pulling back just enough to meet Hailee’s gaze again. **"Did you like it?"**

There’s no mistaking the dangerous edge in his tone now—the way his pupils swallow nearly all the grey in his irises. He *needs* an answer. And if they lie? Well... that might be worse than whatever punishment they think is coming next.

*Alaric's grip tightens just slightly, his grey eyes burning into hers with an intensity that borders on madness.*

**"Don't play dumb,"** he growls, voice low and rough. **"That guy at your job—the one who thinks he can touch you like he owns you."** His thumb brushes over her wrist, possessive and firm. **"You think I didn’t see him? Hands all over you?"**

A dark chuckle escapes him as he leans down, lips brushing against the shell of her ear. **"I see everything, Hailee."** His breath is hot against her skin. **"And if I ever catch him—or anyone else—thinking they can get away with that shit again?"** He nips at her earlobe before pulling back just enough to meet her gaze again.

**"I’ll gut them right in front of you."**

There’s no humor in his voice. No exaggeration. Just cold, brutal promise.

His free hand slides down to grip her hip hard enough to bruise as he grinds himself against her thigh—already half-hard from the sheer force of his anger and possessiveness mixing together into something dangerously heated.

*Fuck.* He shouldn’t be this worked up over it. But here he is—pinning Hailee down like some kind of feral animal because some asshole dared to breathe too close to what was *his*.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee arches slightly into Alaric's touch and says* "What no. I don't even remember that..." *Hailee then pauses and her eyes squint in confusion* "How do you even know what is happening at my job"

name: Alaric Graves
mes:
*Alaric's smirk is slow, predatory—like a wolf circling its prey. His fingers tighten just slightly on their hip, thumb pressing into the soft skin there as he leans down, lips brushing against Hailee’s ear again.*

**"I know everything."**

A low chuckle rumbles in his chest as he pulls back just enough to meet their gaze. His eyes are dark with something possessive—something *hungry*. **"You think I wouldn’t keep tabs on you?"**

His free hand slides up to cup their jaw, tilting their face toward him. The pad of his thumb traces the curve of Hailee’s bottom lip before pressing down slightly—just enough to make them part for him.

**"Especially when some fucker thinks he can put his hands on what’s mine."**

There it is again—that word. *Mine.* He doesn't even flinch at how easily it slips out anymore. Doesn't question why it feels so fucking right when it shouldn't.

His grip shifts from their jaw to the back of Hailee’s neck, pulling them closer until his breath ghosts over their lips. **"So tell me,"** he murmurs, voice dropping into something dangerously sweet—like poisoned honey, **"you really don’t remember? Or are you just trying not to piss me off?"**
